name: Pink Sox 7
description: Pink Sox 7 is a collection of adult-themed mini-games in various genres. It contains another very short episode in the Halftime Lover series; like in the few previous installments, it is non-interactive. Otherwise all the mini-games in this volume are new. A mini-adventure entitled G Gun-Cannon introduces characters seen in other Pink Sox mini-games before (such as Sayaka from Balancing Beam of Love), and is mostly dedicated to lesbian sex between high school girls. Another very simple Japanese-style adventure is an erotic variation on the Red Riding Hood tale. Finally, there is also a simple slot machine mini-game.
